favourite.article: I stumbled upon this wonderful hymn. I keep praying it over and over. May I be absolute to partake of the Living Christ. To be filled with Him. Then spontaneously His life in me will bear much fruit! May our days be FULL of Christ!
PTL! This is really my prayer, that everyday will be a day full of Christ.
Lord, do gain me more, and be fill by You everyday and every moment. Praise You Lord.
I like this song very much! The reality of absolute, continuous surrender to our precious Lord is all we need to do to enjoy His fullness in us! What a joy of peace and rest in Him!
because it encourages me to pursue the Lord more. I want my days full of Christ. I love You Lord.
